messages.msgSnippet: Hi Folks, I have spent a few fruitless hours now trying to come up with a link for a local HS friend who is getting more curious about unschooling. I told her
messages.messageBody:
Hi Folks,
I have spent a few fruitless hours now trying to come up with a link
for a local HS friend who is getting more curious about unschooling.
I told her about AlwaysLearning and one I thought was called
Unschooling 101. I recall a few people mentioning an email(yahoo?)
group with this or a similar name. I couldn't get yahoo to cough it
up - so perhaps it lives elsewhere in the either. I have tried
looking through the archives forever it seems. There must be a trick
to that process that eludes me.
Could someone give me the link and correct name for this "101" group?
Many Thanks,
Sheri in Olympia - who's DD is still in bed at 5pm - Keep Breathing
<G>
